about_the_game:
“Thumb-Thump” (“TT”)
A one-player, 2D rhythm game with five, play-at-any-time (no graduation), scenes.
YOU use language via experience to make neuro-electrical connections with the Source of Eternity.
TT and YOU bring ritualistic ceremonial glyphs in harmony to the Brain-Computer Interface where the Interaction is rhythmic and ancient.

TT is for your THUMBS
When a scene begins, a song will be played.
If YOU can match the right keys at the right moment, your SKILL improves and the flowers turn green.

If your SKILL > 80, YOU progress.
After 45 seconds, the scene and your SKILL will reset.
Mastery: SKILL > 95; experiencing all 15 degrees for all 5 scenes.
Did YOU find the Secret Chamber?

content_descriptors.notes:
1. Partial nudity of (side-view) a nude female statue.
2. Partial nudity of male buttocks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
